definition: surname Di/variant of 狄[Di2], generic name for northern ethnic minorities during the Qin and Han Dynasties (221 BC-220 AD)

sentences.english: Zhai conducted the country's first-ever spacewalk during the mission.
sentences.chinese: 2008年翟志刚成功执行了中国首次太空出舱任务。

sentences.english: Zhai Zhigang is famous as the first man who walked in space in China.
sentences.chinese: 翟志刚作为中国太空行走第一人而闻名。

sentences.english: Zhai Zhigang is the first Chinese astronaut to walk in the outer space.
sentences.chinese: 翟志刚是第一个在外太空行走的中国航天员。

sentences.english: Sword 10 years, this year, "the seven gods" to launch, Zhai Zhigang become astronauts.
sentences.chinese: 十年磨一剑，今年“神七”发射，翟志刚成为航天员。

sentences.english: Look at those guests; can you tell me which is the Taikonaut Zhai Zhigang?
sentences.chinese: 你看来的那些人，你能告诉我哪个是宇航员翟志刚吗？

definition: Yang Liwei (1965-), astronaut, first Chinese citizen in space
Yuri Gagarin (1934-1968), Russian cosmonaut, first human in space
Xu Haifeng (1957-), PRC sharpshooter, 50m pistol gold medalist at Los Angeles 1984 Olympics
(China's achievements of) producing an atomic bomb (1964) and hydrogen bomb (1967) and launching a satellite into space (1970)
Qian Xuesen (1911-2009), Chinese scientist and aeronautical engineer

pinyin: Ha1 li3 sen1 · Shi1 mi4 te4
